H0.text: In what 80s arcade game were you armed with a lance and mounted upon an flying ostrich. Q*bert

H1.text: In what 80s arcade game were you armed with a lance and mounted upon an flying ostrich. Defender

H2.text: In what 80s arcade game were you armed with a lance and mounted upon an flying ostrich. Pole Position

H3.text: In what 80s arcade game were you armed with a lance and mounted upon an flying ostrich. Joust

A4.text: Players assume the role of knights armed with lances and mounted on large birds (an ostrich for Player 1 and a stork for Player 2)
